2098440.name: Shujinkou - Swimsuit Quests
2098440.description:
Swimsuit Quests

Take a plunge into the sparkling seas of Shujinkou with the "Swimsuit Quests" DLC! This episodic expansion delivers a fresh and playful blend of story-driven content, dazzling swimsuits, challenging foes, and opportunities to dive into learning new Japanese kanji:

  • Six Swimsuit Costumes: Dress your Fuu Lobby partners in vibrant beachwear, each unlocking a unique narrative adventure as part of the "Swimsuit Quests."

  • Special Costume Dialogue: Enjoy lively, summer-inspired exchanges between Shu and the cast, bringing these stylish swimsuits to life.

  • New Enemies and Japanese Kanji Lessons: Battle against tough, oceanic-themed foes and learn new Japanese kanji!

  • 18 Story-Driven Quests: Embark on 10-15 hours of engaging gameplay, with each partner’s swimsuit tied to a three-part questline brimming with summer vibes.

Seamless Story Integration

Each quest builds on the previous one, creating a cohesive journey that is more story-driven than most quests in Shujinkou. Progress through the main storyline to unlock more quests, with the third and final quest for each partner becoming available after completing the second arc and all requisite quests.

More Than Just Swimsuits!

With Shujinkou, we’ve crafted more than just eye-catching attire. Each swimsuit is a gateway to meaningful storylines, hundreds of new character interactions, and *unforgettable* moments with your Fuu Lobby partners.
